messages.subject: confusing roles
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/29/02 10:59:02 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/29/02 10:59:02 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I don't know what you could mean! Boromir is just an average ok guy, and
Viggo Mortensen (Aragorn) is gorgeous! Head and shoulders above
what's-his-name <g>. >>

I AGREE!! I was thinking to myself that I need to watch the movie again
because I didn't think Boromir and Aragorn looked that much alike.
So I think I will watch it today....but I remember Aragorn being fairly
adorable and Boromir was just, well, an average ok guy like you said.

Ren
